name: SCHROTT
description:
This game was created during the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

The theme "Roll of the dice" inspired us to experiment with random generation. We developed a rogue-lite - kind of - racing game. Each time the player starts a run, the world will be newly generated and accordingly the loot will also be randomly distributed.

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys - move

Mouse - navigate the menu

  • Collect scrap to upgrade your vehicle between runs.
  • If your HP reaches 0, you lose all your current scrap and bought upgrades.
  • If you survive till the timer runs out, you keep your current scrap and bought upgrades
  • Vlad
  • Linus
  • Gino

"Schrott" is german and means scrap, scrap metal, or even trash.
